title: Man holding a newspaper with Mubārak on the cover
description: The man is wearing a hard hat. Photographer's description: Protestors before & after Mubarak and how they show happy, photos of Ahmed Shafik speaking at his place. Text in image: الدستور: أخيرا تنحىالجيش يتعهد لادارة البلد. Translation of Text in image: Al Dostoor, He Finally stepped Down, Army vows to run the country.
name: Mubārak, Muḥammad Ḥusnī, 1928-
subject-lcsh: Demonstrations; Egypt; Journalism; Revolutions; Protest movements
collection: University on the Square: Documenting Egypt's 21st Century Revolution
source: From: Man holding a newspaper with Mubārak on the cover
